pillar.title: People, Roles, Training and Credentialing
pillar.definition: Definitions of anesthesia roles (CRNA, MDA, AA, SRNA), their training pathways, scopes of practice, credentialing, authority boundaries, and interprofessional dynamics (including CRNA-MDA relationships).
inclusion_tests: Is this about who the provider is, what their role permits, and how they are authorized to practice?
exclusion_tests: Career transitions, workforce shortages, burnout, economics, OR operations.
